programmes.show_description: Joining Radio 5 Live.
Natalie Higgins presents highlights from the BBC's Scottish news podcast.
An act of worship with the Reverend David Coleman, environmental chaplain with Eco-Congregation Scotland.
Zara's This Spiritual Life guest this week is the actor and comedian, Rosie O'Donnell.
News, discussion and interviews from politics and beyond.
All the action live from Ibrox, where Rangers host Celtic in the Scottish Premiership, with both teams looking to make up ground in the race for the title.
The most petty and ill-informed football show on radio.
Join Gary as he shares your special messages and dedications and plays your favourite Scottish music requests.
Jamie has the BBC Scottish Symphony Orchestra in concert & news about a very special collaboration this month featuring Edinburgh Royal Choral Union & Brussels Choral Society.
Roddy Hart plays handpicked tracks from Scotland and beyond. Featuring Dougie Payne, bass player from multi-platinum Scottish indie band Travis.
Joining Radio 5 Live.
News from across Scotland and the world, plus sport, weather, entertainment and big name interviews.
Connie McLaughlin gets to the heart of the stories making the news.
News updates from Scotland and beyond, plus all your lunchtime sport, travel and weather.
Michelle McManus brings you feelgood music and chat with celebrity guests.
Len Pennie interviews Scottish author Deborah Masson about her latest book and chats with David Harewood about his role in Othello, which arrives in cinemas next week.
Breaking down the day's talking points with comment and opinion, plus sport, travel and weather.

programmes.show_name: Get It On with Bryan Burnett
programmes.show_description: Bryan Burnett is looking for you to help create tonight's playlist. Whatever the theme chosen, all you need to do is come up with the songs to match.
Vic is celebrating 30 years of the Trainspotting soundtrack. Plus new Scottish music from Haiver and Carla J Easton, and anthems from Snoop Dogg, Idlewild and Portishead.
The best company to end the day, with lively chat and some of your favourite tunes.
